name: Circle Attack TD 3
description:
Simply put, Circle Attack TD 3 is a tower defense game about circles defending a sidewalk against other circles with the most random objects ever.

The game has nine unique maps, and eight difficulties. It also has 11 towers, each with two upgrade paths, and their own special design. Not enough? Why not try the level editor, which allows you to make your own maps!

Also includes references to some of my previous games such as "untitled space program" and "Engine Calamity".

More mobile support and settings coming soon.
